text: Hi! How are you today?
Doing great, how about yourself?
Very good, thanks for asking! Have you ever thought about donating to Save the Children?
I haven't, what does that charity do?
Save the Childrenhelps children in developing countries by giving them medicine, food and much more!
Oh that sounds like a great cause! Have you personally donated to them before?
Yes I have! I usually donate to them whenever I have extra money.
Do they have a website I could visit?
Of course! It's  URL
I may consider donating a small amount then
That's great! You can donate anything from 0 to 2 dollars. Every litle bit helps!
You can put me down for a dollar, it's not a lot but I feel good about it
Thanks a lot for your contribution! Don't worry about the amount, that one dollar can help a lot!
Is there any other charities you've donated to in the past that you're passionate about?
I also really like the Ronald McDonald House system. Do you have any charities your passionate about?
I haven't donated to them before, but I'm interested in helping the World Wildlife Fund
I've heard of them but I'm not sure what sure what they do.
It's basically the leading organization in wildlife conservation and endangered species
That sounds awesome! I am passionate about that so I will definitely look into them!
Yeah I always enjoy helping animals if I can!
Same here! It's so sad that some species are in so much trouble.
